title.rendered: “IDF and Shin Bet Strike Key Hamas Leaders: Recent Operations Explained”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF and Shin Bet have eliminated key terrorists of the Hamas terrorist organization in recent days.

In a joint operation by the IDF and Shin Bet a few days ago (Thursday), the Air Force’s fighter jets, guided by intelligence from the Military Intelligence and Shin Bet, attacked in the area of Nuzhaireth and eliminated the terrorist Mansour Adel Mansour Kashlan, who was involved in promoting terrorist activities and coordinating attacks for the Hamas terrorist organization within Israel, particularly in the areas of Judea and Samaria.
The terrorist Adel Mansour promoted and executed terrorist activities and was also engaged in coordination and cooperation with terrorist organizations in the Gaza Strip and other countries.

In another joint operation that took place during the week, Air Force aircraft attacked in central camps and eliminated the terrorist Walid Abd Abduallah, an operative in the military wing who simultaneously served as the head of the technology management in the internal security mechanism of the Hamas terrorist organization.
The internal security mechanism of the organization and the technology management that the terrorist led interfere with the operational freedom of the IDF in the Gaza Strip and also constitute a central part of the attempts to thwart espionage that the Hamas terrorist organization conducts.

Furthermore, yesterday (Friday), the Air Force, guided by precise aerial intelligence, attacked and eliminated the terrorist Tarek Darwish in the Nuzhaireth area, who served as a key figure in the aerial network of the Nuzhaireth Battalion in Hamas.
Darwish was involved in the planning and execution of terrorist plots against Israel.
His elimination was completed against the backdrop of terrorist activities carried out by the terrorist organization in the last month, including attempts to harm the operational freedom of the IDF air force.

Attached is documentation of the elimination of the terrorist Tarek Darwish: https://bit.ly/3wXoVha
